name: Dina ZLOCZOWER v. OFFICE OF OPEN RECORDS (PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE). Petition of Pennsylvania State Police
name_abbreviation: Zloczower v. Office of Open Records

parties: Dina ZLOCZOWER v. OFFICE OF OPEN RECORDS (PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE). Petition of Pennsylvania State Police.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 9th day of July, 2012, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and the Application to Amend Case Caption are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
47 A.3d 1179
Dina ZLOCZOWER v. OFFICE OF OPEN RECORDS (PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE). Petition of Pennsylvania State Police.
